meanings.sent1: The stenciled design on the wall was colorful.
meanings.sent2: The stenciled patterns on the floor added a nice touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The stenciled cat on the fence seemed to wink at passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her stenciled smile hid the sadness within.
meanings.sent5: The stenciled flowers looked as if they could bloom any moment.

meanings.sent1: She carefully stenciled the letters onto the sign.
meanings.sent2: He stenciled a beautiful border around the mirror.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child stenciled his name on the forbidden wall.
meanings.sent4: The artist stenciled the night sky onto the canvas with precision.
meanings.sent5: They stenciled a path of stars leading to the secret garden.
